subject: Re: battle of the labs
preview: Hi Rosa,The setup for recurring email of the pending votes are now done.

full_threads.body:
Hi Rosa,

The setup for recurring email of the pending votes are now done.

Hi Heath,



Thanks for fixing the email field.

The voting is really going well! 1000 votes already!



The reminder email:



Beste Battle of the Labs stemmer,



Bedankt voor het stemmen op [VIDEO NAME]. Vergeet niet om jouw stem te bevestigen door op onderstaande link te klikken, pas dan is jouw stem geldig.



[LINK TO VERIFY EMAIL]



Vriendelijke groet,

Kiss Goodbye to MS team Nederland

Hi Joan, 

Regarding your questions: 

1. Fundraisers 

We noticed that the email address field has disappeared on the form, hence why you couldn't see it. We have added it back in so it will be fine now. Unfortunately though, we don't have the email addresses of the pending accounts.

2. Battle of the labs

Wow, what an uptake! We can see the pending ones. Can you please send the follow up text and we will arrange for a second automatic email to be sent if they haven't actioned the first email.

Hi Heath/Joel,


Would you guys be able to help us with the following issues;


1. Fundraisers

As Rosa mentioned, a couple of people started their fundraiser but they remain pending. Could it be that the confirmation email ends up in their spam and they don't see it? We can't see any contact info on these people either (no email address) so basically we are unable to help them to put their fundraiser up and running. Is there a way we can just skip the confirmation step and or do we miss something in this process? We were already wondering why our actions rate was so low but something goes wrong when people want to start the fundraiser.

2. Battle of the Labs

Theres a lot of votes pending , almost 300…is there an automatic reminder that gets send out after a few days? The confirmation email ends up in peoples spam folders so we would love to know if there's anything we can do to get people to validate their vote.




Met vriendelijke groet,


Joan Bergmans



Assistent communicatie






Leidseweg 557-1

2253 JJ Voorschoten


Postbus 200

2250 AE Voorschoten

T 071 - 5 600 500

T 071 - 5 600 501 (direct)

M 06 - 53 26 35 83


http://www.msresearch.nl/

www.msresearch.nl/vriendenloterij





Al ruim 35 jaar wetenschappelijk onderzoek naar en voorlichting over multiple sclerose



Help mee het milieu te beschermen. Denk daar alstublieft even aan voordat u dit bericht afdrukt. Hartelijk dank.


De informatie in deze e-mail is vertrouwelijk en uitsluitend bestemd voor de geadresseerde. Indien u niet de geadresseerde bent, wijzen wij u erop dat u geen recht hebt kennis te nemen van de inhoud van deze e-mail, die te kopiëren of te verstrekken aan andere personen dan de geadresseerde. Indien u deze e-mail abusievelijk hebt ontvangen, verzoeken wij u de afzender op de hoogte te stellen en het originele bericht te vernietigen. Stichting MS Research is niet verantwoordelijk en wijst iedere aansprakelijkheid af voor en/of in verband met alle gevolgen en/of schade van een onjuiste en onvolledige verzending en ontvangst van de inhoud van deze e-mail.

Awesome, thank you so much!



Have a great day!





Met vriendelijke groet,



Joan Bergmans



Assistent communicatie

Hi Joan, 

It's now sharing the 2019 address. Please refresh and try again.

Hi Heath,



I just checked and all the social sharing buttons on Battle of the Labs page are linked to and old (2018) URL https://kissgoodbyetoms.nl/red-lab-coat-day-2018/

Therefor they don't work as this link is old and broken.

I don't see the option to change the social sharing url (normally its placed within settings-shared counts) in wordpress meaning I think you guys have to adjust it for us to the URL https://kissgoodbyetoms.nl/battle-of-the-labs-2019/



Thank you!



Joan

Hi Heath,



No that is absolutely fine. It's just that when you click on the buttons it says the link does not work at all. If it could just link to https://kissgoodbyetoms.nl/battle-of-the-labs-2019/ that would be great!



Also a couple of people started their fundraiser but they remain pending. I'm afraid that the confirm email ends up in their spam and they don't see it. I have no way of contacting them because I cannot see their emailadress.. Is there a way we can just skip the confirmation step?



Thanks again!

Hi Rosa, 

The share buttons share the battle of the labs page not the individual youtube videos. The idea behind this is you want people to come to the site and not youtube. If someone goes to youtube first, they may never journey across to the site.

I hope that clarifies?

Hi Joel,



The battle of the labs has really kicked off with a lot of votes already but the 'share button' below each video doesn't work. Is this something that we can change? I can't find where we can do this. They all just have to link to the battle of the labs page: https://kissgoodbyetoms.nl/battle-of-the-labs-2019/



Can we set a default message for those shares as well?



Thanks again!





Met vriendelijke groet,



Rosa Douw

Communicatie & Projecten

Hi Joan,

We have updated the text below to dutch version.

Awesome, thanks!



-------------
You are about to vote for the [video name] video. Please enter your email address and then check your email inbox to confirm your vote!

U staat op het punt te stemmen voor de video [naam van de video]. Voer uw e-mailadres in en ga naar uw e-mail inbox om uw stem te bevestigen!


-------------
Thanks for your vote! We've sent a confirmation link to your email!


Bedankt voor uw stem! We hebben een bevestigingslink naar uw e-mail verzonden!
-------------
Thanks for your vote! Please click the link below to confirm your favorite video and to lock in your vote!

Confirm your vote




Bedankt voor uw stem! Klik op de onderstaande link om uw stem te bevestigen!





Bevestig uw stem


-------------
CONGRATULATIONS YOUR VOTE HAS BEEN COUNTED!



Gefeliciteerd, je stem is bevestigd.
-------------

Hi Joan, 

Sure, we have removed our test votes. 

If you send through the translations we will load them in for you.

Hi Heath,



Thank you so much.

2 more questions. Where can we see the votes in the backend editor? Is there a way for us to put them on 0 from 12.00 on? We thought the tab entries would show the votes. We saw the entries tab and thought these were the votes but after removing them to the bin nothing happened.



Another question.

We would love to translate the popups. Where can I do so?



Have a great day!





Kind Regards,



Joan Bergmans



Assistent communicatie

Hi Joan, 

Ok great, we added the full links of the videos and that allowed them to load. 

Regarding the voting, we now also activated this. You may want to try it out and translate the pop ups that occur when you vote. Note these popups are to stop people voting more than once : ) Here is the english text: 

------------- 
You are about to vote for the [video name] video. Please enter your email address and then check your email inbox to confirm your vote! 
-------------
Thanks for your vote! We've sent a confirmation link to your email!
-------------
Thanks for your vote! Please click the link below to confirm your favourite video and to lock in your vote! 

Confirm your vote
-------------
CONGRATULATIONS YOUR VOTE HAS BEEN COUNTED!
-------------

Hi Heath,



All youtube links are set to public (visible) and we turned off the comment/like section on Youtube and added the vote link at the subscription area below… to be sure people go to the KGTMS website to vote.

Doing so i hoped the videos on our webpage would show the start of the video, but unfortunately it only does so with the last "Nederlandse Heresenbank…"video. Can't get my head around why the others don't show any image of the video. Would you be able to support us in this?

https://kissgoodbyetoms.nl/battle-of-the-labs-2019/



Thank you!



Kind Regards,



Joan Bergmans



Assistent communicatie

Hi Rosa, 

I will be best if you publish the videos. That way we can set the article to publish on 1 May (your time) and they are ready to go. We will add the voting to the page tomorrow as well.
@joel we can chat about this one.

Hi Heath,

I’ve uploaded all the videos on our youtube channel but I want to publish them on the 1st of may at 12:00 (our time). That’s when I also want the voting system to go live but I’m not sure how we can do this best. Do I need to set the video’s to public already? And share the link to the labs as well and only make clear that the voting will start on the 1st of may 12:00? Because now the video’s look weird as you can see: https://kissgoodbyetoms.nl/battle-of-the-labs-2019/ <https://kissgoodbyetoms.nl/battle-of-the-labs-2019/>

I don’t know why one is working and the rest is not because they are all still ‘hidden’


Thanks!

Rosa Douw
Communicatie & Projecten
